title: Uncapped FPS, Capped at 60 FPS?
body: I'm having an issue. Ever-since the patch 6.16 Patch update released I have been capped at 60 FPS that fluctuates between 16-27 FPS in major teamfights. I never had an issue with Frame Rates before the patch update...I would have 300 FPS max and around 150+ FPS consistently...Anyone know of a way to fix this?

replies.body: The update may have messed up your game files and causing your FPS to drop.  It could also be outdated drivers, or something else entirely.  To rule out possibilities, our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide will take you through a series of steps for troubleshooting.  This should get you squared away!
I am having the same issue someone please help x_x
